sys_script_include.name: isBorrowed

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_2723f86797be11103e1f7cb0f053af62
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_898711_library_m.isBorrowed</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>isBorrowed</name><script><![CDATA[var isBorrowed = Class.create();
isBorrowed.prototype = {
    isborrowing: function(title) {
		var borrow = new GlideRecord('x_898711_library_m_book_transaction');
		borrow.addQuery('borrowed_book', 'CONTAINS', title);
		borrow.addEncodedQuery('state=-5^ORstate=2');
		borrow.query();
		gs.info("isB:" +borrow.getRowCount());
		return borrow.getRowCount();
    },

    type: 'isBorrowed'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-02 09:52:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>2723f86797be11103e1f7cb0f053af62</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>isBorrowed</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Library Management System" source="x_898711_library_m">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Library Management System">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2723f86797be11103e1f7cb0f053af62</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-02 09:54:47</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
